pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detailed Meteorological Data from Stations All Over the World // Acquire hourly meteorological data from stations located all over the world. There is a wealth of data available, with historic weather data accessible from nearly 30,000 stations. The available data is automatically downloaded from a data repository and processed into a 'tibble' for the exact range of years requested. A relative humidity approximation is provided using the 'August-Roche-Magnus' formula, which was adapted from Alduchov and Eskridge (1996) doi:10.1175%2F1520-0450%281996%290 35%3C0601%3AIMFAOS%3E2.0.CO%3B2.
